snippet: Floyd Mayweather Jr. was tested by the hard-hitting Argentine Marcos Maidana, but he prevailed by a majority decision to improve to 46-0.
lead_paragraph: Floyd Mayweather Jr. was tested by the hard-hitting Argentine Marcos Maidana, but he prevailed by a majority decision to improve to 46-0.

headline.main: Mayweather, Bloodied but Still Unbeaten, Defeats Maidana by Decision
headline.print_headline: Mayweather, Bloodied but Still Unbeaten, Defeats Maidana by Decision
